list.name: Default
list.comment: In Homework_3 added sub-items to tasks: Task 1.1 - Create a list Task 1.2 - Create a list using list constructor Task 1.3.1 - Create a list of strings Task 1.3.2 - Create a list using the split method Task 1.4 - Create list using list comprehension Task 2.1 - Add item to the end of the Regular_list Task 2.2 - Add item to List_constructor at fixed index Task 2.3 - Remove item from Regular_list at fixed index Task 2.4 - The function removes a specific Regular_list item Task 2.5 - The function 'pop' deletes a list item by its index Task 3.1 - Sorting the list using the function 'reverse' and 'sort' Task 3.2 - Ascending sorting algorithm Task 4.1 - Filter numbers >0 using Filter function with lambda Task 4.2 - Filter numbers >0 using Filter function with callback Task 4.3 - Filter number >0 using list comprehension Task 4.4 - Create copy of link for this list Task 4.5 - Create copy of list using module copy.deepcopy Task 4.6 - Create copy of list using list slices Task 4.7 - Multiply all elements of the The_sun list by 5 Task 4.8 - Combine all elements of the list into a string Task 4.11 - Change every list item Task 4.12 - Change each element of the list using the lambda function Task 4.13 - Find the minimum value of the list using the standard function Task 4.14 - Find the maximum value of the list using the standard function Task 4.15 - The algorithm for finding the maximum and minimum values ​​of the list
